articles.title: Monkeypox outbreak: What we know so far - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Cases of monkeypox are being investigated in several countries in Europe and North America.
articles.content:
Just when the world thought it was done with the worst of COVID, an outbreak of another virus has scientists worried.
